name: Lemon Biscuits for Tulip
description:
Wisteria woke up today feeling a little tired. Even the darkest tea won’t be strong enough to make them feel energised. They decide to visit Tulip and bring along freshly baked lemon biscuits. Hopefully Tulip will like them…

CREDITS

PROGRAMMING, MUSIC: instantnoedel 
GRAPHICS: shem 
SOUND AND WRITING: miwikiwi

You might want to keep the game windowed on your screen so Wisteria and Tulip can keep you company.
